resources.string: A walking route along the history of Breda. A short walk through the center that will introduce you to the profound culture and history of this beautiful city.
The route of the Blind Walls
A walking route along wall paintings of Breda. The Blind Walls Gallery is a museum on the street. The collection grows every year.
This app needs the Location permission, please accept to use location functionality.
This application requires an internet connection to function.
Tap anywhere outside the notification to continue

You are near:


Tap the marker to see the information!

Welcome to the Columbus app!\n\nThis application is made to help tourists visit Breda on their own. There are multiple routes to choose from on the "Route selection" screen, which, after being selected will automatically show on the map.

This is the route selection screen. On this screen you will see a list of all the routes that the app has. You can select a route by clicking on it and you will be automatically redirected to the folder.

This is the GPS screen. In this screen you can see the selected route. Each route contains a number of points where you can walk along the shortest route by following the route. If you are close to a route, you will receive a notification. When you click on a point in the route, you get the corresponding information about this point.
